recipesJson.name: Thanksgiving Cranberry Sauce
recipesJson.author: JenniferJarvis
recipesJson.description: Tis the season for cranberry sauce. Sweet, cool, full of cranberry flavor with that jelly taste. If you're looking for a holiday flavor this year, give this a try. Can be vaped fresh, but tastes great after several days to a week steep. Visit flavor-pro.com for more info and recipes. photo credit: Didriks Libeco Harvest Table Linen via photopin (license)

reviews.text: That flavoring percentage is a big turn off for me. I dont roll with the mark of the beast.
